body.p: Some respondents noted that the impairment model that would be incorporated into IFRS 9 is arguably the most important part of the IASB’s response to the global financial crisis. Consequently, although they believe that sufficient time should be allowed for the implementation of IFRS 9, they expressed concern about any delay that is not strictly necessary. These respondents recommended that the IASB should allow no more than two years for the implementation of IFRS 9.
